content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the chair in this query description: "this chair is kept closer to the table. on right a white board can be seen on the wall.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"
In view 1, a chair is visible close to a table, and there is a whiteboard on the wall to the right. This matches the description provided in the query.

Here is the annotated image of the selected view. 
All objects belonging to the chair class is labeled by a unique number (ID) in red color on it.
Please select the object ID that best matches the given query description: "this chair is kept closer to the table. on right a white board can be seen on the wall.".
Carefully analyze the specified conditions (such as shape, color, relative position with surrounding objects) in the given query, then select top-5 best-matched object IDs.
The selected top-5 object IDs should be sorted in descending order of confidence.
The object ID should be chosen from this list [4, 7, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 17, 20, 25, 27, 28, 29, 30, 31, 38, 41, 51, 72, 81]
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified and ranked the top-5 target object IDs.
"object_id": A list of5 selected target object IDs. e.g., [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

The query describes a chair that is closer to a table with a whiteboard visible on the right wall. Based on the image, chairs with IDs 25, 27, 41, 51, and 81 are positioned close to tables. Among these, ID 51 and ID 81 are closer to the right side of the image where a whiteboard is visible. ID 51 is directly adjacent to the table and near the whiteboard, making it the best match. ID 81 is also close to the whiteboard but slightly further from the table. IDs 27 and 41 are close to the table but further from the whiteboard. ID 25 is close to the table but not near the whiteboard.
